Author: Richard Branson
Quotation: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing and falling over.

Author: Richard Branson
Quotation: My definition of success? The more you're actively and practically engaged, the more successful you will feel.

Author: Richard Branson
Quotation: I think that there's a very thin dividing line between success and failure. And I think if you start a business without financial backing, you're likely to go the wrong side of that dividing line.

Author: Richard Branson
Quotation: Happiness is the secret ingredient for successful businesses. If you have a happy company it will be invincible.

Author: Richard Branson
Quotation: You can't do a good business with a bad person. Find the right people to work with and you can't go wrong.

Author: Richard Branson
Quotation: Don't become a slave to technology - manage your phone, don't let it manage you.

Author: Richard Branson
Quotation: If you don't have time for the small things, you won't have time for the big things.

Author: Richard Feynman
Quotation: No problem is too small or too trivial if we can really do something about it.

Author: Richard Feynman
Quotation: I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned.

Author: Richard G. Scott
Quotation: Righteous character is more valuable than any material object you own, any knowledge you have gained through study, or any goals you have attained no matter how well lauded by mankind.

Author: Richard Paul Evans
Quotation: Everyone who got where they are had to begin where they were.

Author: Rick Cook
Quotation: Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning.

Author: Rick Tate
Quotation: Merely satisfying customers will not be enough to earn their loyalty. Instead, they must experience exceptional service worthy of their repeat business and referral. Understand the factors that drive this customer revolution.

Author: Rita Mae Brown
Quotation: Good judgement comes from experience, and often experience comes from bad judgement.

Author: Roald Dahl
Quotation: And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it.

Author: Rob Kalin
Quotation: The last 10 percent it takes to launch something takes as much energy as the first 90 percent.

Author: Robert A. Humphrey
Quotation: An undefined problem has an infinite number of solutions.

Author: Robert Brault
Quotation: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.

Author: Robert Brault
Quotation: Charisma is not so much getting people to like you as getting people to like themselves when you're around.

Author: Robert C. Martin
Quotation: Truth can only be found in one place: the code.

Author: Robert C. Martin
Quotation: So if you want to go fast, if you want to get done quickly, if you want your code to be easy to write, make it easy to read.

Author: Robert Copeland
Quotation: To get something done, a committee should consist of no more than three men, two of whom are absent.

Author: Robert Frost
Quotation: The best way out is always through.

Author: Robert Frost
Quotation: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.

Author: Robert Frost
Quotation: I took the road less traveled by...and that has made all the difference.

Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quotation: What would you do if you knew you could not fail?

Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quotation: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.

Author: Robert Heinlein
Quotation: In the absence of clearly defined goals we become strangely loyal to performing daily trivia until ultimately we become enslaved by it.

Author: Robert Herjavec
Quotation: Tough times never last; tough people always do.

Author: Robert Herjavec
Quotation: If you are under the illusion that you can start a business and run it at your life's schedule, you are mistaken. The business is like a starving puppy--when it needs to eat, then it needs to eat regardless of what you have going on personally.

Author: Robert Herjavec
Subjects: Shark Tank, Business, Plan, Solution, Priority
Quotation: Don't start a business. Find a problem. Solve a problem. The business comes second.

Author: Robert Herjavec
Quotation: If you're emotional and you're great at something, the money will follow.

Author: Robert Herjavec
Quotation: I don't look at failure as death. I don't look at failure as finality. I just look at it and pick myself up and say, 'We shouldn't have done that,' and move on.

Author: Robert Herjavec
Subjects: Shark Tank, Wealth, Investment, Startup, Sales
Quotation: Don't ever be enamored by what something sells for. It's more important what you get to keep in your pocket.

Author: Robert Herjavec
Subjects: Startup, Entrepreneur, Shark Tank, Goal, Top 100
Quotation: A goal without a timeline is just a dream.

Author: Robert Ingersoll
Quotation: We rise by lifting others.

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quotation: Perpetual devotion to what a man calls his business, is only to be sustained by perpetual neglect of many other things.

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quotation: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

Author: Robert Nystrom
Quotation: I'm not saying simple code takes less time to write. You'd think it would since you end up with less total code, but a good solution isn't an accretion of code, it's a distillation of it.

Author: Robert Orben
Quotation: If you can laugh together, you can work together.

Author: Robert Rose
Quotation: Marketing is telling the world you're a rock star. Content marketing is showing the world you are one.

Author: Robert Schumann
Quotation: If we were all determined to play the first violin, we should never have an ensemble. Therefore, respect every musician in his proper place.

Author: Robert Scoble
Quotation: Great companies are built, not launched.

Author: Robert Stephens
Quotation: Advertising is the tax you pay for being unremarkable.

Author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
Quotation: Failure defeats losers, failure inspires winners.

Author: Roberto Monaco
Quotation: Either your goals are stretching you or your excuses are limiting you.

Author: Roberto Monaco
Quotation: Will you spend the rest of your life influencing, or being influenced?

Author: Roberto Monaco
Quotation: Know who they are, but speak to who they will become.

Author: Roberto Monaco
Quotation: Either you have a sense of urgency today or a sense of regret tomorrow.

Author: Robin Sharma
Quotation: Silence your critics. Ignore your haters. Delete your cynics.

Author: Roelof Botha
Quotation: You have to put yourself in a position to be lucky.

Author: Roger Gentis
Quotation: People who are lost in their lives tend to follow people who are lost in their theories.

Author: Roger Staubach
Quotation: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: Any time is a good time to start a company.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: You have to be decisive. The only way to make progress is make decisions.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: Bootstrap for as long as you can.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: When you start a company, you have to go find somebody as good or better than you to be the co-founder.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: We at SV Angel end up investing in 1 company for every 30 that we look at.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: When you first meet an investor, you've got to be able to say in one compelling sentence what your product does.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: I think it's important for the founder to say to themselves in the beginning, at what point does my ownership start to demotivate me?

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: When you're talking to me in the first minute, I'm thinking -- is this person a leader?

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: If you're going to be a leader, and hire a team, assuming your product is successful, you've got to be a really good communicator.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: Procrastination is the devil in startups. So no matter what you do, you gotta keep that ship moving.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: I'm hoping that it's based on a personal problem that founder had, and this product is the solution to that personal problem.

Author: Ron Conway
Quotation: Usually the first question I ask is, what inspired you to invent this product?

Author: Rosa Parks
Quotation: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.

Author: Rosalynn Carter
Quotation: A leader takes people where they want to go. A great leader takes people where they don't necessarily want to go, but ought to be.

Author: Ross Perot
Quotation: Spend a lot of time talking to customers face to face. You'd be amazed how many companies don't listen to their customers.

Author: Roy Ash
Quotation: An entrepreneur tends to bite off a little more than he can chew hoping he'll quickly learn how to chew it.

Author: Rumi
Quotation: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise so I am changing myself.

Author: Rumi
Quotation: Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames.

Author: Rumi
Quotation: Happiness is now.

Author: Russell Simmons
Quotation: Don't worry what others are doing. Do you!

Author: Russell Simmons
Quotation: You just have to pay attention to what people need and what has not been done.

Author: Russell Warren
Quotation: Obsessed is just a word the lazy use to describe the dedicated.

Author: Sahil Lavingia
Quotation: Making something people want includes making a company that people want to work for.

Author: Salman Khan
Quotation: Personal responsibility is not only undervalued but actually discouraged by the standard classroom model, with its enforced passivity and rigid boundaries of curriculum and time. Denied the opportunity to make even the most basic decisions about how and what they will learn, students stop short of full commitment.

Author: Salman Khan
Quotation: I teach the way that I wish I was taught. The lectures are coming from me, an actual human being who is fascinated by the world around him.

Author: Salman Khan
Quotation: My basic philosophy of teaching was straightforward and deeply personal. I wanted to teach the way I wished that I myself had been taught. Which is to say, I hoped to convey the sheer joy of learning, the thrill of understanding things about the universe. I wanted to pass along to students not only the logic but the beauty of math and science. Furthermore, I wanted to do this in a way that would be equally helpful to kids studying a subject for the first time and for adults who wanted to refresh their knowledge; for students grappling with homework and for older people hoping to keep their minds active and supple.

Author: Sam Altman
Quotation: No growth hack, brilliant marketing idea, or sales team can save you long-term if you don't have a sufficiently good product.

Author: Sam Altman
Quotation: Remember that you are more likely to die because you execute badly then get crushed by a competitor.

Author: Sam Altman
Quotation: Share results (financial and key metrics) with the company every month.

Author: Sam Altman
Quotation: Obsess about the quality of the product.

Author: Sam Altman
Quotation: It's better to have a few users love your product than for a lot of users to sort of like it.

Author: Sam Ervin Jr.
Quotation: The world of the mind is an illimitable land whose boundaries are as vast as the universe itself, and thought is calling us at all times to the undiscovered countries lying beyond the next visible range of mountains.

Author: Sam Ervin Jr.
Quotation: We all find occasions where we have to choose between what we believe is right and what we suspect is advantageous.

Author: Sam Levenson
Quotation: You must learn from the mistakes of others. You can't possibly live long enough to make them all yourself.

Author: Sam Levenson
Quotation: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

Author: Sam Walton
Quotation: The goal as a company is to have customer service that is not just the best but legendary.

Author: Sam Walton
Quotation: High expectations are the key to everything.

Author: Sam Walton
Quotation: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.

Author: Sam Walton
Quotation: There is only one boss. The Customer. And he can fire everyone in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money elsewhere.

Author: Samuel Butler
Quotation: All progress is based upon a universal innate desire on the part of every organism to live beyond its income.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quotation: Nothing at all will be attempted if all possible objections must first be overcome.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quotation: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quotation: Silence propagates itself, and the longer talk has been suspended, the more difficult it is to find anything to say.

Author: Sara Blakely
Quotation: Don't be intimidated by what you don't know. That can be your greatest strength and ensure that you do things differently from everyone else.

Author: Sara Blakely
Quotation: Embrace what you don't know, especially in the beginning because what you don't know can become your greatest asset. It ensures that you will absolutely be doing things different from everybody else.

Author: Sarah Lacey
Quotation: Life of an entrepreneur: I wake up excited and terrified every day.

Author: Say's Law
Quotation: Production is the source of demand.

Author: Scott Adams
Quotation: Remember that there's no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.

Author: Scott Cook
Quotation: A brand is no longer what we tell the consumer it is -- it is what consumers tell each other it is.

Author: Scott Hamilton
Quotation: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.

Author: Scott Harrison
Quotation: Inspiration is difficult to measure, but the results driven by that inspiration are powerful.

Author: Scott Stratten
Quotation: If you're your authentic self, you have no competition.

Author: Sean Parker
Quotation: Your biggest challenge as an entrepreneur is not concealing your idea from others or keeping your idea a secret, it is actually convincing people that you're not crazy and that you can pull this off.

Author: Segal's Law
Quotation: A man with a watch knows what time it is. A man with two watches is never sure.

Author: Seneca The Younger
Quotation: It's not because things are difficult that we dare not venture. It's because we dare not venture that they are difficult.

Author: Seneca The Younger
Quotation: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for kindness.

Author: Seneca The Younger
Quotation: One should count each day as a separate life.

Author: Seneca The Younger
Quotation: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

Author: Seneca The Younger
Quotation: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

Author: Seneca The Younger
Quotation: A thing is never too often repeated which is never sufficiently learned.

Author: Seneca The Younger
Quotation: What you think of yourself is much more important than what others think of you.

Author: Sercan Leylek
Quotation: Every programmer is an author.

Author: Seth Bannon
Quotation: Don't be a lone wolf. Lean on the experience and smarts of your teammates, investors, and mentors to help solve the tough problems and take advantage of the opportunities.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: Waiting for perfect is never as smart as making progress.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: Making promises and keeping them is a great way to build a brand.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: How can you squander even one more day not taking advantage of the greatest shifts of our generation? How dare you settle for less when the world has made it so easy for you to be remarkable?

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: You have brilliance in you, your contribution is valuable, and the art you create is precious. Only you can do, and you must.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: What people want is the extra, the emotional bonus they get when they buy something they love.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: Our job is to connect to people, to interact with them in a way that leaves them better than we found them, more able to get where they'd like to go.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: The media wants overnight successes (so they have someone to tear down). Ignore them. Ignore the early adopter critics who never have enough to play with. Ignore your investors who want proven tactics and predictable instant results. Listen instead to your real customers, to your vision, and make something for the long haul. Because that's how long it's going to take.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: Build it, and they will come only works in the movies. Social Media is a build it, nurture it, engage them and they may come and stay.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: You don't need more time, you just need to decide.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: The only thing worse than starting something and failing... is not starting something.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: Most people are searching for a path to success that is both easy and certain. Most paths are neither.

Author: Seth Godin
Quotation: Marketing is no longer about the stuff that you make, but about the stories you tell.

Author: Seymour Cray
Quotation: The trouble with programmers is that you can never tell what a programmer is doing until it's too late.

Author: Shakespeare
Quotation: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

Author: Shane Snow
Quotation: Launching a startup is like firing off a rocket ship, then trying to hold it together with duct tape.

Author: Shep Hyken
Quotation: Customer service is the experience we deliver to our customer. It's the promise we keep to the customer. It's how we follow through for the customer. It's how we make them feel when they do business with us.

Author: Sheri L. Dew
Quotation: True leaders understand that leadership is not about them but about those they serve. It is not about exalting themselves but about lifting others up.

Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quotation: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.

Author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quotation: Presenting leadership as a list of carefully defined qualities (like strategic, analytical and performance-oriented) no longer holds. Instead, true leadership stems from individuality that is honestly and sometimes imperfectly expressed. Leaders should strive for authenticity over perfection.

Author: Shiv Singh
Quotation: The purpose of a business is to create a customer who creates customers.

Author: Sigmund Freud
Quotation: Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.

Author: Sigmund Freud
Quotation: People commonly use false standards of measurement -- they seek power, success and wealth for themselves and admire them in others, and they underestimate what is of true value in life.

Author: Simon Sinek
Quotation: Anyone could be a leader if there was no cost. True leaders willingly pay a price, to sacrifice self interest, to have the honor to lead.

Author: Simon Sinek
Quotation: People don't buy what you do, they buy why you do it.

Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quotation: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

Author: Simone Weil
Quotation: Do not allow yourself to be imprisoned by any affection. Keep your solitude. The day, if it ever comes, when you are given true affection there will be no opposition between interior solitude and friendship, quite the reverse. It is even by this infallible sign that you will recognize it.

Author: Siqi Chen
Quotation: Life is short. Do stuff that matters.

Author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
Quotation: Mediocrity knows nothing higher than itself, but talent instantly recognizes genius.

Author: Sir Claus Moser
Quotation: Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.

Author: Sir Francis Bacon
Quotation: Choose the life that is most useful and habit will make it the most agreeable.

Author: Sir Frederick G. Banting
Quotation: No one has ever had an idea in a dress suit.

Author: Sir Joshua Reynolds
Quotation: If you have great talents, industry will prove them; if moderate abilities, industry will supply their deficiencies. Nothing is denied to well-directed labor; nothing is ever to be attained without it.

Author: Sir Richard Steele
Quotation: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.

Author: Sir Thomas Browne
Quotation: Charity begins at home.

Author: Sir William Osler
Quotation: Look wise, say nothing, and grunt. Speech was given to conceal thought.

Author: Slava Akhmechet
Quotation: Minimize complexity. The simpler the product, the more likely you are to actually ship it, and the more likely you are to fix problems quickly.

Author: Snackwell effect
Quotation: Dieters will eat more low-calorie cookies, such as SnackWells, than they otherwise would for normal cookies.

Author: Socrates
Quotation: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.

Author: Socrates
Quotation: An unexamined life is not worth living.

Author: Solomon Ibn Gabriol
Quotation: The first step in the acquisition of wisdom is silence, the second listening, the third memory, the fourth practice, the fifth teaching others.

Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quotation: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.

Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quotation: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use.

Author: Spafford's Adoption Rule
Quotation: For just about any technology, be it an operating system, application or network, when a sufficient level of adoption is reached, that technology then becomes a threat vector.

Author: St. Augustine
Quotation: There is something in humility which strangely exalts the heart.

Author: St. Evremond
Quotation: There is as much ingenuity in making a felicitous application of a passage as in being the author of it.

Author: St. Jerome
Quotation: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.

Author: Stephanie Barron
Quotation: When a quiet man is moved to passion, it seems the very earth will shake.

Author: Stephanie S. Mead
Quotation: Strategic leaders must not get consumed by the operational and tactical side of their work. They have a duty to find time to shape the future.

Author: Stephen Hawking
Quotation: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

Author: Stephen Leacock
Quotation: Advertising may be described as the science of arresting the human intelligence long enough to get money from it.

Author: Stephen R. Covey
Quotation: Always treat your employees exactly as you want them to treat your best customers.

Author: Stephen R. Covey
Quotation: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.

Author: Stephen R. Covey
Quotation: Most people do not listen with the intent to understand; they listen with the intent to reply.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: The company that consistently makes and implements decisions rapidly gains a tremendous, often decisive, competitive advantage.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: Business plans are the tool existing companies use for execution. They are the wrong tool to search for a business model.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: Revolutions are not obvious when they happen. When James Watt started the industrial revolution with the steam engine in 1775 no one said, 'Today, everything changes.' When Karl Benz drove around Mannheim in 1885, no one said, 'There will be 500 million of these driving around in a century.' And certainly in 1958 when Noyce and Kilby invented the integrated circuit, the idea of a quintillion (10 to the 18th power) transistors being produced each year seemed ludicrous.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: For truly visionary founders 'seeing things that could be' means more than just a standalone product -- it means a world transformed.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: In a startup, no business plan survives first contact with customers.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: You need to ask yourself, 'Where do you want to work: startups, mid-size or large companies?' If you find yourself debating the 'startup versus large company' choice you've already chosen the big company. Entrepreneurship isn't a career choice it's a passion and obsession.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: Some small segment of founders are truly artists; they see something no one else does. These entrepreneurs are the ones who want to change 'what is' and turn it into 'what can be.' These founders create new ideas and new markets by pushing the boundaries. This concept of creating something that few others see -- and the reality distortion field necessary to recruit the team to build it -- is at the heart of what these founders do.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: What matters is having forward momentum and a tight fact-based data/metrics feedback loop to help you quickly recognize and reverse any incorrect decisions. That's why startups are agile. By the time a big company gets the committee to organize the subcommittee to pick a meeting date, your startup could have made 20 decisions, reversed five of them and implemented the fifteen that worked.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: A startup is not about executing a series of knowns. Most startups are facing a series of unknowns: unknown customer segments, unknown customer needs, unknown product feature set, etc.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: If the opportunity is so large, and the barriers to starting up so low, why haven't the number of scalable startups exploded exponentially? What's holding us back? While it's easier than ever to draw an idea on the back of the napkin, build a prototype or create a small business on the side, it's still hard to quit your day job and commit 'all in.'

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: Almost everything important is at first opposed by stakeholders in the status quo. Be relentless, persistent and tenacious.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: A startup is a temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: Building a successful business model isn't about changing your company based on every bit of feedback: it's about understanding whom to listen to and why.

Author: Steve Blank
Quotation: Startups are painful, stressful and at times demoralizing. You need to be a true believer in the vision of what you are doing. You need to passionate about it and love what you're doing. If you don't, there is no way you can sustain the hours, stress and disappointment. There's no way you're going to be able to convince investors, customers and most importantly recruit a world-class team if you're not building something you think is going to change the world.

Author: Steve Case
Quotation: It's not about how to get started; it's about how to get noticed.

Author: Steve Curtin
Subjects: Customer Service, Action, Customer Service, Result
Quotation: Customer service is a voluntary act that demonstrates a genuine desire to satisfy, if not delight, a customer.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Most people do not ever pick up the phone. They never ask, and that is what separates the people that do things from the people that just dream about them. You have to act, and you have to be willing to fail. You have to be willing to crash and burn, because if you are afraid of failing, you will not get very far.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: The people who built Silicon Valley were engineers. They learned business, they learned a lot of different things, but they had a real belief that humans, if they worked hard with other creative, smart people, could solve most of humankind's problems. I believe that very much.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: For the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: 'If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?' And whenever the answer has been 'No' for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Much of what I stumbled into by following my curiosity and intuition turned out to be priceless later on.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Get closer than ever to your customers. So close that you tell them what they need well before they realize it themselves.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Deciding what not to do is as important as deciding what to do.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Design is a funny word. Some people think design means how it looks. But of course, if you dig deeper, it's really how it works.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: It's really hard to design products by focus groups. A lot of times, people don't know what they want until you show it to them.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like, design is how it works.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Good PR educates people. That's all it is. You can't con people in this business. The products speak for themselves.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Details matter, it's worth waiting to get it right.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: People think focus means saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. But that's not what it means at all. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Apple's goal isn't to make money. Our goal is to design and develop and bring to market good products. We trust as a consequence of that, people will like them, and as another consequence, we'll make some money. But we're really clear about what our goals are.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non successful entrepreneurs is perseverance.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: To me, ideas are worth nothing unless executed. They are just a multiplier. Execution is worth millions.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: My job is not to be easy on people. My job is to make them better.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Don't be trapped by dogma -- which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Innovation has nothing to do with how many R&D dollars you have. When Apple came up with the Mac, IBM was spending at least 100 times more on R&D. It's not about money. It's about the people you have, how you're led, and how much you get it.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Learn continually - there's always one more thing to learn!

Author: Steve Jobs
Quotation: Life is about creating and living experiences that are worth sharing.

Author: Steve Jobs

Author: The Law of Diffusion of Innovation

Quotation: As the rate of erroneous alerts increases, operator reliance, or belief, in subsequent warnings decreases.

Author: The Law of Truly Large Numbers
Quotation: Given a sample size large enough, any outrageous thing is likely to happen.

Author: The Laws of Software Systems Evolution
Quotation:
"I. Law of Continuing Change: A system must be continually adapted, else it becomes progressively less satisfactory in use. 
2. Law of Increasing Complexity: As a system is changed its complexity increases and becomes more difficult to evolve unless work is done to maintain or reduce the complexity. 
3. Law of Self Regulation: Global system evolution is feedback regulated. 
4. Law of Conservation of Organizational Stability: The work rate of an organization evolving a software system tends to be constant over the operational lifetime of that system or phases of that lifetime. 
5. Law of Conservation of Familiarity: In general, the incremental growth (growth rate trend) of systems is constrained by the need to maintain familiarity. 
6. Law of Continuing Growth: The functional capability of systems must be continually enhanced to maintain user satisfaction over system lifetime. 
7. Law of Declining Quality: Unless rigorously adapted and evolved to take into account changes in the operational environment, the quality of a system will appear to be declining. 
8. Law of Feedback System: Evolution processes are multi-level, multi-loop, multi-agent feedback systems."

Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Author: Thich Nhat Hanh

Author: Thich Nhat Hanh

Author: Unknown

Author: Unknown
Quotation: Stay strong. Even when it feels like everything's falling apart.

Author: Unknown
Quotation: Skill is successfully walking a tightrope over Niagara Falls. Intelligence is not trying.

Author: Unknown
Quotation: Sometimes the best thing you can do is not think, not wonder, not imagine, not obsess. Just breathe and have faith that everything will work out for the best.

Author: Unknown
Quotation: Five percent of the people think, ten percent of the people think they think; and the other eighty - five percent would rather die than think.

Author: Unknown
Quotation: There is never a good time to do anything. So do it when you have a chance.

Author: Unknown
Quotation: The richest man is not he who has the most, but he who needs the least.

Author: Vaibhav Shah
Quotation: Whenever you see a successful person, you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quotation: A man is not idle because he is absorbed in thought. There is a visible labor and there is an invisible labor.

Author: Victor Kiam
Quotation: Entrepreneurs are risk takers, willing to roll the dice with their money or reputation on the line in support of an idea or enterprise. They willingly assume responsibility for the success or failure of a venture and are answerable for all its facets.

Author: Victoria Moran
Quotation: In this moment, there is plenty of time. In this moment, you are precisely as you should be. In this moment, there is infinite possibility.

Author: Victoria Ransom
Quotation: Even if you don't have the perfect idea to begin with, you can likely adapt.

Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quotation: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves.

Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quotation: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom.

Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quotation: Live as if you were living a second time, and as though you had acted wrongly the first time.

Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quotation: Life can be pulled by goals just as surely as it can be pushed by drives.

Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quotation: The meaning of life differs from man to man, from day to day and from hour to hour. What matters, therefore, is not the meaning of life in general but rather the specific meaning of a person's life at a given moment.

Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quotation: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.

Author: Vince Lombardi
Quotation: Winners never quit. Quitters never win.

Author: Vince Lombardi
Quotation: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.

Author: Vince Lombardi
Quotation: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

Author: Vince Lombardi
Quotation: Individual commitment to a group effort: That is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.

Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quotation: Great things are not done by impulse, but a series of small things brought together.

Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quotation: If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.

Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quotation: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.

Author: Virgil
Quotation: Fortune favors the bold.

Author: Virgil
Quotation: They can conquer who believe they can.

Author: Virgil Garnett Thomson

Author: Vivek Wadhwa
Quotation: I advise all of the entrepreneurs that I know to attend at least one entrepreneurship event every week. The worst thing an entrepreneur can do is to confine his or herself to a cubbyhole.

Author: W. Clement Stone
Quotation: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.

Author: W. Clement Stone
Quotation: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman, not the attitude of the prospect.

Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quotation: Profit in business comes from repeat customers; customers that boast about your product and service, and that bring friends with them.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quotation: You learn more quickly under the guidance of experienced teachers. You waste a lot of time going down blind alleys if you have no one to lead you.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quotation: Sometimes people carry to such perfection the mask they have assumed that in due course they actually become the person they seem.

Author: W.B. Yeats
Quotation: The world is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.

Author: W.M. Lewis
Quotation: The tragedy of life is not that it ends so soon, but that we wait so long to begin it.

Author: Waldi Ravens

Author: Walt Disney
Quotation: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

Author: Walt Disney
Quotation: If you can dream it, you can do it.

Author: Walt Disney
Quotation: It's quite fun to do the impossible.

Author: Walt Disney
Quotation: The difference in winning and losing is, most often, not quitting.

Author: Walt Whitman
Quotation: Do I contradict myself? Very well then I contradict myself. I am large, I contain multitudes.

Author: Walter D. Wintle
Quotation: If you think you are beaten, you are. If you think you dare not, you don't! If you want to win, but think you can't, it's almost a cinch you won't. If you think you'll lose, you're lost; For out in the world, we find success begins with a fellow's will; it's all in the state of the mind. Life's battles don't always go to the stronger and faster man, but sooner or later, the man who wins is the man who thinks he can.

Author: Walter Elliot

Author: Warren Beatty

Author: Warren Bennis
Quotation: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: You only have to do a very few things right in your life so long as you don't do too many things wrong.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Derivatives are financial weapons of mass destruction.

Author: Warren Buffett

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: If a business does well, the stock eventually follows.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: The business schools reward difficult complex behavior more than simple behavior, but simple behavior is more effective.

Author: Warren Buffett

Author: Warren Buffett

Author: Warren Buffett

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: If you are in a poker game and after 20 minutes you don't know who the patsy is, then you're the patsy.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: It's better to hang out with people better than you. Pick out associates whose behavior is better than yours and you'll drift in that direction.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: I don't look to jump over seven-foot bars; I look around for one-foot bars that I can step over.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Should you find yourself in a chronically leaking boat, energy devoted to changing vessels is likely to be more productive than energy devoted to patching leaks.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: We enjoy the process far more than the proceeds.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: We simply attempt to be fearful when others are greedy and to be greedy only when others are fearful.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Focus on your customers and lead your people as though their lives depend on your success.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: If past history was all that is needed to play the game of money, the richest people would be librarians.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Only when you combine sound intellect with emotional discipline do you get rational behavior.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Our favorite holding period is forever.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: We believe that according the name 'investors' to institutions that trade actively is like calling someone who repeatedly engages in one-night stands a 'romantic.'

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Never invest in a business you can't understand.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: The investor of today does not profit from yesterday's growth.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Only buy something that you'd be perfectly happy to hold if the market shut down for 10 years.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: You do things when the opportunities come along. I've had periods in my life when I've had a bundle of ideas come along, and I've had long dry spells. If I get an idea next week, I'll do something. If not, I won't do a damn thing.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Without passion, you don't have energy. Without energy, you have nothing.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Wall Street is the only place that people ride to in a Rolls Royce to get advice from those who take the subway.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: It's far better to buy a wonderful company at a fair price than a fair company at a wonderful price.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: It is not necessary to do extraordinary things to get extraordinary results.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: The smarter the journalists are, the better off the society is to a degree. People read the press to inform themselves; and the better the teacher, the better the student body.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Time is the friend of the wonderful company, the enemy of the mediocre.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quotation: Rule No. 1: Never lose money. Rule No. 2: Never forget Rule No. 1.

Author: Warren Whitlock
Quotation: My goal is to spark something within the reader and allow it to initiate an idea they then can grow.

Author: Waseem Latif
Quotation: Think twice, code once.

Author: Waseem Latif
Quotation: First solve the problem. Then, write the code.

Author: Waseem Latif

Author: Wayne Dyer

Author: Wayne Dyer

Author: Wayne Dyer
Quotation: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at will change.

Author: Wayne Dyer
Quotation: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.

Author: Wayne Dyer
Quotation: You can not be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.

Author: Wayne Gretzky
Quotation: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.

Author: Wayne Gretzky
Quotation: I skate to where the puck is going to be, not where it has been.

Author: Weibull's Power Law
Quotation: The logarithm of failure rates increases linearly with the logarithm of age.

Author: Wendy Tan White
Quotation: Sustaining a successful business is a hell of a lot of work, and staying hungry is half the battle.

Author: Wernher von Braun
Quotation: Basic research is when I'm doing what I don't know I'm doing.

Author: Wes Angelozzi

Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quotation: We're here for a reason. I believe a bit of the reason is to throw little torches out to lead people through the dark.

Author: Will Rogers
Quotation: Things will get better despite our efforts to improve them.

Author: Will Rogers
Quotation: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.

Author: Willa Cather
Quotation: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.

Author: William Arthur Ward
Quotation: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it; if you can dream it, you can become it.

Author: William Arthur Ward
Quotation: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.

Author: William Arthur Ward
Quotation: Greatness is not found in possessions, power, position, or prestige. It is discovered in goodness, humility, service, and character.

Author: William B. Sprague
Quotation: A collection of rare thoughts is nothing less than a cabinet of intellectual gems.

Author: William Butler Yeats
Quotation: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.

Author: William Durant
Quotation: Forget mistakes. Forget failures. Forget everything except what you're going to do now and do it.

Author: William Durant

Author: William Ernest Henley
Quotation: I am the master of my fate, I am the captain of my soul.

Author: William Frederick Halsey Jr.
Quotation: There are no great people in this world, only great challenges which ordinary people rise to meet.

Author: William H. Davidow
Quotation: The longer you wait, the harder it is to produce outstanding customer service.

Author: William Hazlitt
Quotation: As is our confidence, so is our capacity.

Author: William James
Quotation: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

Author: William James
Quotation: If you can change your mind, you can change your life.

Author: William James
Quotation: Wisdom is learning what to overlook.

Author: William James
Quotation: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.

Author: William Pollard
Quotation: Without change there is no innovation, creativity, or incentive for improvement. Those who initiate change will have a better opportunity to manage the change that is inevitable.

Author: William S. Burroughs
Quotation: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quotation: I always feel happy because I don't expect anything from anyone. Expectations always hurt. Life is short so love your life, be happy and keep smiling. Just live for yourself and before you speak, listen. Before you write, think. Before you spend, earn. Before you pray, forgive. Before you hate, love. Before you quit, try. Before you die, live.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quotation: Brevity is the soul of wit.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quotation: Be great in act as you have been in thought.

Author: William Somerset Maugham
Quotation: Excess on occasion is exhilarating. It prevents moderation from acquiring the deadening effect of a habit.

Author: William Somerset Maugham
Quotation: Love is a dirty trick played on us to achieve the continuation of the species.

Author: Wilson Mizner
Quotation: A good listener is not only popular everywhere, but after a while he gets to know something.

Author: Winston Churchill
Quotation: Success is never final. Failure is never fatal. It is courage that counts.

Author: Winston Churchill
Quotation: We make a living by what we get. But we make a life by what we give.

Author: Winston Churchill
Quotation: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.

Author: Winston Churchill
Quotation: Never, Never, Never Give up.

Author: Winston Churchill
Quotation: Solitary trees, if they grow at all, grow strong.

Author: Winston Churchill
Quotation: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quotation: I not only use all the brains that I have, but all I can borrow.

Author: Woodrow Wilson
Quotation: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.

Author: Woody Allen
Quotation: If you're not failing now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything innovative.

Author: Woody Allen
Quotation: 80 percent of success is just showing up.

Author: Wu-Men
Quotation: If your mind isn't clouded by unnecessary things, this is the best season of your life

Author: Yakut
Quotation: Deep down we have the qualities of clarity, awareness, sensitivity, warmth and love. But we have little idea at the outset just how deep and vast those qualities can be.

Author: Yoda
Quotation: Do or do not; there is no try.

Author: Yogi Bhajan
Quotation: When ego is lost, limit is lost. You become infinite, kind, beautiful.

Author: Yves Behar
Quotation: Advertising is the price companies pay for being unoriginal.

Author: Zeigarnik Effect
Quotation: The tendency to experience intrusive thoughts about an objective that was once pursued and left incomplete.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: You can have everything you want in life if you just help others get what they want in their life.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: Statistics suggest that when customers complain, business owners and managers ought to get excited about it. The complaining customer represents a huge opportunity for more business.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: The tougher you are on yourself, the easier life will be on you.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: Outstanding people have one thing in common: An absolute sense of mission.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: Happiness is not pleasure, it is victory.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: You don't build a business. You build people and then people build the business.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: What you get by reaching your destination is not nearly as important as what you become by reaching your destination.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quotation: You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
